html:
Benches taking a sunbath
Blooming of flowers
All life forms
Woken up to existence
An enslaved human
Awaiting for freedom
Fighting for it in court
Frustrated
And world lives, physical
World lives, magical
Awaits, calls
Wont let you forget about it
When a soldier dies on a war
A hedgehog searches for a meal
A car speeds on a road
Meteorite burns in atmosphere
title: Benches
